--- alter_table_drop_column.sql
alter table foo drop column bar

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.FQN{
    Schema: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
    Name:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 12,
      NameEnd: 15,
      Name:    "foo",
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.DropColumn{
    Drop: 16,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 28,
      NameEnd: 31,
      Name:    "bar",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo DROP COLUMN bar
